statements: SELECT * FROM legislative_impact;
SELECT community_id, impact_description, legislative_decision_id FROM legislative_impact;
SELECT * FROM legislative_impact WHERE community_id = 1;
SELECT community_id, impact_description FROM legislative_impact WHERE legislative_decision_id = 3;
SELECT impact_description, community_id FROM legislative_impact ORDER BY community_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM legislative_impact WHERE community_id = 1 AND legislative_decision_id = 3;
SELECT impact_description FROM legislative_impact WHERE legislative_decision_id = 5;
SELECT community_id, legislative_decision_id FROM legislative_impact WHERE community_id = 2 ORDER BY legislative_decision_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM legislative_impact WHERE legislative_decision_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND community_id > 2;
SELECT impact_description, community_id FROM legislative_impact WHERE community_id = 1 OR legislative_decision_id = 4 ORDER BY community_id, legislative_decision_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Communities;
SELECT community_name, population FROM Communities WHERE population > 1000;
SELECT community_name FROM Communities WHERE community_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT community_name, population FROM Communities ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT c.community_name, ld.decision_description FROM Communities c INNER JOIN LegislativeDecisions ld ON c.community_id = ld.impact_on_community;
SELECT * FROM Communities ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT community_name, population FROM Communities WHERE population > 10000;
SELECT community_name, COUNT(*) AS total_decisions FROM Communities JOIN LegislativeDecisions ON Communities.community_id = LegislativeDecisions.impact_on_community GROUP BY community_name;
SELECT * FROM Communities WHERE population BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY community_name ASC;
SELECT community_name, decision_description FROM LegislativeDecisions JOIN Communities ON LegislativeDecisions.impact_on_community = Communities.community_id;
SELECT * FROM legislation_impact WHERE id = 1;
SELECT impact FROM legislation_impact WHERE community_id = 5;
SELECT decision_name, decision_date FROM legislation_decisions WHERE decision_type = 'positive';
SELECT community_name, population, region FROM communities WHERE population > 100000;
SELECT decision_id, community_id, impact FROM legislation_impact ORDER BY community_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM legislation_impact WHERE impact='Positive';
SELECT community_name, population FROM communities WHERE region='North';
SELECT decision_id, community_id FROM legislation_impact ORDER BY decision_id ASC;
SELECT decision_name, decision_date FROM legislation_decisions WHERE decision_type='Legal';
SELECT * FROM legislation_impact WHERE community_id IN (SELECT id FROM communities WHERE region='South') ORDER BY impact ASC;
SELECT community_name, population FROM communities WHERE population > 1000
SELECT decision_id, decision_date, decision_description FROM legislative_decisions ORDER BY decision_date DESC
SELECT community_id, community_name, population FROM communities WHERE community_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT community_id, community_name, impact_type FROM communities JOIN community_impact ON communities.community_id = community_impact.community_id WHERE impact_type = 'positive'
SELECT detail_info FROM impact_details WHERE detail_id IN (SELECT detail_id FROM impact_details WHERE impact_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000')
SELECT community_name, population FROM communities WHERE population > 1000 ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT decision_description FROM legislative_decisions WHERE decision_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY decision_date ASC;

SELECT c.community_name, d.decision_description, i.impact_type FROM communities c JOIN community_impact i ON c.community_id = i.community_id JOIN legislative_decisions d ON i.decision_id = d.decision_id;
SELECT c.community_name, i.impact_type, id.detail_info FROM communities c JOIN community_impact i ON c.community_id = i.community_id JOIN impact_details id ON i.impact_id = id.impact_id;

SELECT c.community_name, d.decision_date, id.detail_info FROM communities c JOIN community_impact i ON c.community_id = i.community_id JOIN legislative_decisions d ON i.decision_id = d.decision_id JOIN impact_details id ON i.impact_id = id.impact_id;
SELECT * FROM legislative_decisions;
SELECT decision_name, impact_description FROM legislative_decisions ORDER BY decision_id DESC;
SELECT decision_id, decision_name, impact_description FROM legislative_decisions WHERE decision_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM communities WHERE population_size > 10000 ORDER BY community_name;
SELECT lawmaker_name, political_party FROM lawmakers WHERE political_party = 'Democratic' ORDER BY lawmaker_name;
SELECT decision_name, impact_description FROM legislative_decisions
SELECT community_name, population_size FROM communities
SELECT lawmaker_name, political_party FROM lawmakers
SELECT decision_name, impact_description FROM legislative_decisions WHERE decision_id > 5
SELECT community_name, population_size FROM communities ORDER BY population_size DESC
